# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Creates a capture for the given component.

## Declaration

```swift
init<W, C1, C2, C3>(_ component: some RegexComponent) where Output == (Substring, W, C1, C2, C3)
```

## Parameters

- **component**: The regex component to capture.
title: init(_:)
